document_data.name: The Copper Tap
document_data.mainbody: '''The Copper Tap''' was a tavern in [[Calimshan]], famed for its award-winning brews in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Services: The Copper Tap was a locally popular establishment that brewed its own type of award-winning [[ale]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, sailor [[PJ Stubbs]], a friend of [[Bosun Gannet]] of the [[Blushing Mermaid]] in [[Baldur's Gate]], found himself in Calimshan and decided to visit The Copper Tap. The discussion he quickly regretted, claiming that its award-winning brew tasted like "flowers had a wank on his tongue." PJ hated the taste so much that the sailor complained about it in a letter sent to Bosun Gannet. Even ten pints of ale failed to wash the taste off.
